title: Is it worth buying a new phone without 5G functionality? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes! Most 5G networks suck at the moment so your 4G might beat the 5G network in some cases. Unless you have Verizon's 5G which is god-tier unlike T-Mobile's 5G. In some cases I find my 4G better than T-Mobile's 5G. Go ahead and get a new phone, 5G probably won't be as good soon.
